item.title: Sarah add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "The little girl knew if she bit any member of her family, they would get rabies too, and she died without ever having been petted. I cried so hard Mrs. Underwood had to take me to the school nurse." -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "Grandma Harper has two green bottles shaped like women with black hair painted on their heads and a yellow glass colored captain's hat that she keeps her face powder in that I want too, and a picture of a naked girl in a swing, swinging way up in the air over castles in a blue sky. I don't know why I want those things, I just do." -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it. People think pleasing God is all God cares about. But any fool living in the world can see it always trying to please us back." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Just remember that the things you put into your head are there forever, he said. You might want to think about that. You forget some things, dont you? Yes. You forget what you want to remember and you remember what you want to forget." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "When he went back to the fire he knelt and smoothed her hair as she slept and he said if he were God he would have made the world just so and no different." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Then they set out along the blacktop in the gunmetal light, shuffling through the ash, each the other's world entire." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Just remember that the things you put into your head are there forever, he said." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Sara Zarr
item.description: ". . .There are certain people who come into your life, and leave a mark. . . Their place in your heart is tender; a bruise of longing, a pulse of unfinished business. Just hearing their names pushes and pulls at you in a hundred ways, and when you try to define those hundred ways, describe them even to yourself, words are useless." -- Sara Zarr

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Sara Zarr
item.description: "Because love, love is never finished. It circles and circles, the memories out of order and not always complete." -- Sara Zarr

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Sara Zarr
item.description: "You were never what I wanted to forget." -- Sara Zarr

item.title: Sarah add a quote by sara zarr
item.description: "he's a story i want to know from page one " -- sara zarr

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Kaye Gibbons
item.description: "I might be confused sometimes in my head but it is not something you need to talk about. Before you can talk you have to line it all up in order and I had rather just let it swirl around until I am too tired to think. You just let the motion in your head wear you out. Never think about it. You just make a bigger mess that way." -- Kaye Gibbons

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Kaye Gibbons
item.description: "You can rest with me until somebody comes to get you. We will not say anything. We can rest." -- Kaye Gibbons

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All the effort in the world won't matter if you're not inspired." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "your handwriting. the way you walk. which china pattern you choose. it's all giving you away. everything you do shows your hand. everything is a self portrait. everything is a diary." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Sarah add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "There is a basin in the mind where words float around on thought and thought on sound and sight. Then there is a depth of thought untouched by words, and deeper still a gulf of formless feelings untouched by thought." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "There are years that ask questions and years that answer." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A human being is a part of the whole called by us universe, a part limited in time and space. He experiences himself, his thoughts and feeling as something separated from the rest, a kind of optical delusion of his consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us. Our task must be to free ourselves from this prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sarah add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Sarah add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "The fact is always obvious much too late, but the most singular difference between happiness and joy is that happiness is a solid and joy a liquid." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Sarah add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "And I can't be running back and fourth forever between grief and high delight." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut Jr.
item.description: "And I urge you to please notice when you are happy, and exclaim or murmur or think at some point, 'If this isn't nice, I don't know what is." -- Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Maturity is a bitter disappointment for which no remedy exists, unless laughter could be said to remedy anything." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
Sarah add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description:
"To be is to do - Socrates
To do is to be - Sartre
Do Be Do Be Do - Sinatra" -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "All right - I'll tell you what you did for me: you went for happy, silly, beautiful walks with me." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, and the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach. The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it's yours." -- Ayn Rand
